name: Evil Cube (Yadislash)
description: Evil Cube is a Shooter made with Unreal Engine 4. This game was made by Yadislash, who is new to game-making. this game is very simple, you have to shoot the evil cubes until you are tired of doing it. Please don't expect big things like health, stamina, aiming, etc. this game was made by only one 9-year-old, so I think I did a pretty on this game for a tween. The controls are simple: LMB for shooting, WASD or arrow keys for moving, Space Bar for jumping, and P key/ 1 for pausing. I'm also working on another project which I am guaranteed to do better on. I hope you enjoy this game!
